intention: Identify the relationship between areas using Pythagorean tree properties.
note: In a Pythagorean tree, the area of the largest square C is the sum of the areas of squares A and B.

intention: Calculate the area of square C using the given areas of squares A and B.
Map the calculated area to the closest multiple-choice option.
note: The calculated area of square C is 8, which corresponds to option D.

intention: Format the final answer to match the multiple-choice format.
